title: Hepatic Encephalopathy Grades/Stages
desc: The Hepatic Encephalopathy Grades/Stages defines criteria for the stages of hepatic encephalopathy based on West Haven Criteria.

orgreference.text: Hepatic Failure: An Evidence Based Approach in the Emergency Department. Emergency Medicine Practice, 2010.

options.label: Changes in behavior with minimal change in level of consciousness
Gross disorientation, drowsiness, possibly asterixis, inappropriate behavior
Marked confusion, incoherent speech, sleeping most of the time but arousable to vocal stimuli
Comatose, unresponsive to pain; decorticate or decerebrate posturing
